title: Rob Holland (race car driver)
description:
Robb Holland  is an American racecar driver who has competed in several international racing series. He's racing in the British Touring Car Championship, World Touring Car Championship, and the Pikes Peak Hill Climb. We talk about how he got started, what his favorite race cars were, and what he's driving at Pikes Peak this year.

@robbholland3

https://www.facebook.com/RobbHollandRacing/

http://www.rotekracing.com/

Follow us! T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman

Watch the show!: https://youtu.be/AzkJbqWQEc8
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
